trends: There have been 53 other sightings in Rochester
There was one other sighting in Rochester on or around October 25th 2009
Viewing Distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
divs: sighting detailsgentlemen: i live on lake ontario and for the past year have been filming many ufo events on the lake. i have invited witnesses to do our ufo night watching and have on my video camera 60-70 strange encounters. i have multiple orange shaped intelligent flying objects flying over lake, i have white orbs appearing and flying towards my house. i have seen 2 huge ships. the first time was a very large almost giant diamon shaped ship traveling at a high rate of speed spinning with red, white lights among other lights and the ship was spinning rapidly. i have seen lights that look like stars at first glow very bright and suddenly dart in close to my home. i have used things such as very bright glowing lamps in total darkness which seems to almost attract them, i have used lasers and i am successfull at attracting them about 50% of the times that i have tried. i have on tape a strange object come up from the lake and appear about 50 feet in front of me and a group of witnesses just this past may. this happened while i was filming a white orb coming toward us, and suddenly a splash from the lake and this object came up people within the group started to run away (this is all documented on my camera) i live approximately 1\2 mile from guinea nuclear plant and since there is a restrictive no fly zone the triangel red blinking objects are here frequently. i began noticing these objects while sitting on my dock watching sunset and i saw a silver like cylinder shaped flying around, this is what started my fascination, my neighbors can attest to many of the things i have stated here and i actually believe that i can attract these crafts using some of the methods i have developed that seem to get their attention and since i now have so many documented events and over 20 people who have been invited and have witnessed these strange events, i believe u can gather evidence here that may prove it once and for all. i should tell you that on more than one occasion myself and the people i was with did feel threatened and the ufos did seem aggresive , but for the most part they seem to go away quickly when they feel like it. i am very close to actually making my own documentary footage and inviting people thru ads so i have differnet peopls real live accounts on tape, i would like to keep my footage to myself right now but will provide it to you if you would like to investigate these multiple sightings.
Summary: Orange, White lights Triangle shaped and also Diamond Shaped with red lights
Object Shape: Cigar, Circle, Cylinder, Diamond, Disc, Egg, Fireball, Triangle
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
